# The `InlineAdvisor` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Interface for deciding whether to inline a call site or not. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<CodeBlock>class llvm::InlineAdvisor</CodeBlock>

  type="void"

This must be called when the Inliner pass is entered, to allow the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor">InlineAdvisor</a> update internal state, as result of function passes run between Inliner pass runs (for the same module). <a href="#ab2cc3a8b2ee3d65fd980f63923fa2880">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

## Description {#details}

Interface for deciding whether to inline a call site or not.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### getAdvice() {#af70fa833673e4ac07c323a4a94e7ba93}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; InlineAdvice &gt; InlineAdvisor::getAdvice (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp; CB, bool MandatoryOnly=false)</>}>
Get an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvice">InlineAdvice</a> containing a recommendation on whether to inline or not.

<code>CB</code> is assumed to be a direct call. <code>FAM</code> is assumed to be up-to-date wrt previous inlining decisions. <code>MandatoryOnly</code> indicates only mandatory (always-inline) call sites should be recommended - this allows the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor">InlineAdvisor</a> track such inlininings. Returns:
<ul>
<li>An <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvice">InlineAdvice</a> with the inlining recommendation.</li>
<li>Null when no recommendation is made (<a href="https://reviews.llvm.org/D110658">https://reviews.llvm.org/D110658</a>). TODO: Consider removing the Null return scenario by incorporating the SampleProfile inliner into an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor">InlineAdvisor</a></li>
</ul>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/inlineadvisor-h/#l00178">178</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/inlineadvisor-h">InlineAdvisor.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineadvisor-cpp/#l00615">615</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineadvisor-cpp">InlineAdvisor.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getAnnotatedInlinePassName() {#ab32ca9cecc0266fccc75103624277d56}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const char &#42; llvm::InlineAdvisor::getAnnotatedInlinePassName () const</>}

NOTE pass name is annotated only when inline advisor constructor provides <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/inlinecontext">InlineContext</a>.

### onPassEntry() {#ab2cc3a8b2ee3d65fd980f63923fa2880}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::InlineAdvisor::onPassEntry (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazycallgraph/scc">LazyCallGraph::SCC</a> &#42; SCC=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
This must be called when the Inliner pass is entered, to allow the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor">InlineAdvisor</a> update internal state, as result of function passes run between Inliner pass runs (for the same module).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/inlineadvisor-h/#l00184">184</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/inlineadvisor-h">InlineAdvisor.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### onPassExit() {#adb8650aeef845449ba752a76a4237559}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::InlineAdvisor::onPassExit (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazycallgraph/scc">LazyCallGraph::SCC</a> &#42; SCC=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
This must be called when the Inliner pass is exited, as function passes may be run subsequently.

This allows an implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor">InlineAdvisor</a> to prepare for a partial update, based on the optional SCC.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/inlineadvisor-h/#l00189">189</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/inlineadvisor-h">InlineAdvisor.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
